prompts: Create a playful fire-type Pokemon with a fluffy tail and a friendly expression.
I want a small quadruped Pokemon that has bright orange fur and black stripes.
Generate a fire Pokemon design featuring a cute puppy-like creature with a confident stance.
Make an adorable Pokemon with a vibrant orange coat, resembling a dog, for a fantasy game.
Imagine a warm-hearted fire-type creature that loves to roam in grassy fields and forests.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of a dog and a lion, with striking colors and features.
Show me a Pokemon that exudes loyalty and bravery, with a fluffy mane and a fiery spirit.
